name: Campeones
summary:
Only champions reach the finish line. With your prototype you can take part in the most exciting rally race in the world in Campeones. Up to eight runners can participate in the same race, taking turns at the start. The test consists of six stages, having to go through them in a specified minimum time to be able to move on to the next one. You must have a lot of skill to finish the stage without crashing before you arrive, or not running over the race commissioner, because you will also be disqualified.

If you're ready, get behind the wheel of your racing car and race!!
